content: Bus interchange located in Bukit Merah, SingaporeThis article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "HarbourFront Bus Interchange" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(November 2016)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* **HarbourFront Bus Interchange** is located within [HarbourFront](/wiki/HarbourFront_(Singapore)) along Seah Im Road off Telok Blangah Road in [Bukit Merah](/wiki/Bukit_Merah) planning area, Singapore. The interchange serves the nearby residential estates of [Telok Blangah](/wiki/Telok_Blangah) and [Bukit Purmei](/wiki/Bukit_Purmei) and also the [HarbourFront](/wiki/HarbourFront_(Singapore)) commercial district, including [HarbourFront Centre](/wiki/HarbourFront_Centre) and [VivoCity](/wiki/VivoCity). The interchange is directly connected to [Seah Im Food Centre](/wiki/Seah_Im_Food_Centre) and [HarbourFront MRT station](/wiki/HarbourFront_MRT_station). It is the southernmost bus interchange in Singapore. ## History The interchange commenced operations on 13 January 1985 with 5 services and was initially named 'World Trade Centre Bus Terminal' until it was subsequently renamed to its present name in 2003, alongside the renaming of the World Trade Centre to HarbourFront. ## Bus Contracting Model Under the [Bus Contracting Model](/wiki/Bus_contracting_model_of_Singapore), all bus services operating from HarbourFront Bus Interchange were divided into 6 Bus Packages, operated by three different bus operators. ### List of Bus Services OperatorPackageRoutes**Go-Ahead Singapore**Tampines65 (From July 2026)**SBS Transit**Bishan-Toa Payoh124Bukit Merah93, 123MSengkang-Hougang80Tampines65 (Until July 2026)**SMRT Buses**Choa Chu Kang-Bukit Panjang188, 188e**Tower Transit Singapore**Sembawang-Yishun855, 963, 963e - Interchanges and Terminals (SBS Transit) - Interchange/Terminal (SMRT Buses) This article about a Singapore building or structure is a stub. title: HarbourFront Bus Interchange
